articles.title: About me
articles.description: Developer and analyst excited about the energy transition.

articles.contents:
library(wordcloud2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(tibble)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(webshot)
webshot::install_phantomjs()

words <- c("energy transition", "R", "Python", "grid resilience","distributed energy resources","energy demand modeling","data centers","web development","economic modeling","data science","sustainability","Django","R Shiny","JavaScript","geospatial analysis","entrepreneurship")

df <- tibble(word=words, freq=1)

wordcloud <- wordcloud2(data=df, size=.5, color = rep_len( c("#2171b5","#6baed6", "#bdd7e7", "#d5cfff", "#aaaaaa"), nrow(df) ), shape="circle", gridSize = 30, ellipticity = 0.25)
saveWidget(wordcloud, "tmp.html", selfcontained = F)
webshot::webshot("tmp.html","img/wordcloud.png",vwidth = 3000, vheight = 1050.5)

              University of California, Santa Barbara
              
              
              
              Software developer & energy data analyst living in San
              Diego. Currently developing a dashboard to calculate the
              value of a utility-scale front-of-meter solar energy
              generation project in CA. I love surfing, daily
              meditation, and nerding out on energy.
